00047 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00048  * @brief   This function handles NMI exception.
00049  * @retval  None
00050  ************************************************************************************************************/
00051 void NMI_Handler(void)
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00056  * @brief   This function handles Hard Fault exception.
00057  * @retval  None
00058  ************************************************************************************************************/
00059 void HardFault_Handler(void)
00060 {
00061   #if 1
00062 
00063   static vu32 gIsContinue = 0;
00064   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065   /* For development FW, MCU run into the while loop when the hardfault occurred.                           */
00066   /* 1. Stack Checking                                                                                      */
00067   /*    When a hard fault exception occurs, MCU push following register into the stack (main or process     */
00068   /*    stack). Confirm R13(SP) value in the Register Window and typing it to the Memory Windows, you can   */
00069   /*    check following register, especially the PC value (indicate the last instruction before hard fault).*/
00070   /*    SP + 0x00    0x04    0x08    0x0C    0x10    0x14    0x18    0x1C                                   */
00071   /*           R0      R1      R2      R3     R12      LR      PC    xPSR                                   */
00072   while (gIsContinue == 0)
00073   {
00074   }
00075   /* 2. Step Out to Find the Clue                                                                           */
00076   /*    Change the variable "gIsContinue" to any other value than zero in a Local or Watch Window, then     */
00077   /*    step out the HardFault_Handler to reach the first instruction after the instruction which caused    */
00078   /*    the hard fault.                                                                                     */
00079   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00080 
00081   #else
00082 
00083   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00084   /* For production FW, you shall consider to reboot the system when hardfault occurred.                    */
00085   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086   NVIC_SystemReset();
00087 
00088   #endif
00089 }
00090

00115 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00116  * @brief   This function handles ADC1 interrupt.
00117  * @retval  None
00118  ************************************************************************************************************/
00119 void ADC0_IRQHandler(void)
00120 {
00121   extern u32 gADC0_Result[2];
00122   extern vu32 gADC0_CycleEndOfConversion;
00123 
00124   if (ADC_GetIntStatus(HT_ADC0, ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC) == SET)
00125   {
00126     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED2);
00127     ADC_ClearIntPendingBit(HT_ADC0, ADC_FLAG_CYCLE_EOC);
00128     gADC0_CycleEndOfConversion = TRUE;
00129     gADC0_Result[0] = HT_ADC0->DR[0] & 0x0FFF;
00130     gADC0_Result[1] = HT_ADC0->DR[1] & 0x0FFF;
00131   }
00132 }
00133 
00134 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00135  * @brief   This function handles ADC1 interrupt.
00136  * @retval  None
00137  ************************************************************************************************************/
00138 void ADC1_IRQHandler(void)
00139 {
00140   extern u32 gADC1_Result[2];
00141   extern vu32 gADC1_CycleEndOfConversion;
00142   if (ADC_GetIntStatus(HT_ADC1, ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC) == SET)
00143   {
00144     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED3);
00145     ADC_ClearIntPendingBit(HT_ADC1, ADC_FLAG_CYCLE_EOC);
00146     gADC1_CycleEndOfConversion = TRUE;
00147     gADC1_Result[0] = HT_ADC1->DR[0] & 0x0FFF;
00148     gADC1_Result[1] = HT_ADC1->DR[1] & 0x0FFF;
00149   }
00150 }
00151 
00152 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00153  * @brief   This function handles GPTM interrupt.
00154  * @retval  None
00155  ************************************************************************************************************/
00156 void GPTM0_IRQHandler(void)
00157 {
00158   if (TM_GetIntStatus(HT_GPTM0, TM_INT_CH3CC) == SET)
00159   {
00160     TM_ClearIntPendingBit(HT_GPTM0, TM_INT_CH3CC);
00161     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00162   }
00163 }
